polyline.style: fill: none; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width:var(--icon-stroke-width-m, calc(var(--icon-stroke-width, 5) * 1));

path.style: fill: none; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width:var(--icon-stroke-width-m, calc(var(--icon-stroke-width, 5) * 1));

polygon.style: fill: none; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width:var(--icon-stroke-width-m, calc(var(--icon-stroke-width, 5) * 1));
